com.kuryshee.safehome.httprequestsender

Class FormUploader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kuryshee.safehome.httprequestsender.FormUploader

  • public class FormUploader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods for sending multi-part HTTP POST requests to a web server according to RFC1341 standard.
    Author:
    Ekaterina Kurysheva

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FormUploader(java.lang.String request, java.lang.String charset)
      This constructor initializes a new multi-part HTTP POST request.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFilePart(java.lang.String inputName, java.io.File uploadFile)
      Adds a file to the request
      void addFormField(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
      Adds a form input field to the request
      void addHeader(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Adds header to the request.
      void connect()
      Finishes settings of the connection and gets output stream for writing data.
      java.lang.String finish()
      Completes the request and reads the response from the server.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FormUploader

        public FormUploader(java.lang.String request,
                    java.lang.String charset)
             throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor initializes a new multi-part HTTP POST request.
        Parameters:
        request - is a full URL link.
        charset - is a definition of encoding for this request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • addHeader

        public void addHeader(java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.String value)
        Adds header to the request. The method must be called before connect().
        Parameters:
        key - of the header
        value - for the key.

      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Finishes settings of the connection and gets output stream for writing data. The method must be called before addFormField(String, String) or addFilePart(String, File) methods.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • addFilePart

        public void addFilePart(java.lang.String inputName,
                        java.io.File uploadFile)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Adds a file to the request
        Parameters:
        inputName - name attribute in HTML form input
        uploadFile - a File to be uploaded
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • addFormField

        public void addFormField(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String value)
        Adds a form input field to the request
        Parameters:
        name - field name
        value - field value

      • finish

        public java.lang.String finish()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Completes the request and reads the response from the server.
        Returns:
        server response as a String if the status is OK, otherwise an exception is thrown.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
